name: Fleshware
description:
The factory's robots are no longer responding to commands: their biodrivers, or as they are colloquially known as "Fleshware", are starting to seep out of their containment shells and contaminating the robots' mechanisms, bending them to the parasite's will, instead of the other way around. You are the last human worker alive in the facility, find a way out before you are consumed by the FLESHWARE.

Or this is what the plot would be if there was one, in reality the game is just an unfinished level with malfunctioning npcs which may or may not even attack :\

This is my first unity game and the first jam I partecipate in, which says alot. I spent like, 80% of the time making the robot model and I did the entire level the very last day, please forgive this horrendous "game"

Controls - 

Arrow keys: move

Control: run

Controller may or may not work
